about_the_game:
Welcome to "Paper Arcade: Bombs A'hoy Edition"! Get ready to set sail on an explosive adventure as you navigate through a paper world filled with bombs and enemies.

In this game, you will take on the role of a fearless bomb-wielding hero, tasked with destroying all the obstacles and enemies in your path. To do this, you'll need to strategically place bombs and detonate them at just the right time, while avoiding traps and enemy fire.

But be careful! One wrong move could send you flying, leaving you vulnerable to enemy attacks and explosions. And as you progress through the game, the obstacles and enemies will become more challenging, requiring even more strategic thinking and quick reflexes to overcome.
